R

RegisterHandler - Class in Handler
Register Class, used to connect and query the database the check if the request username/email the user wishes to register, also provides functionality to insert the requested user into the database.
RegisterHandler() - Constructor for class Handler.RegisterHandler
 
RegisterServlet - Class in Servlet
Register Servlet is used to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the data.
RegisterServlet() - Constructor for class Servlet.RegisterServlet
 
RegisterUser(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Handler.RegisterHandler
Method RegisterUser, used to register requested user into the database, the user has already been validated, so we know it's safe to insert the user into the database.
rejectDutchAuction(int) - Static method in class Handler.AuctionHandler
Updates the isActive flag on the server to declare the auction over and no longer visible to anyone
RejectDutchAuctionServlet - Class in Servlet
RejectDutchAuctionServlet handles the reject call and redirects back to AdminViewAuctionListServlet
RejectDutchAuctionServlet() - Constructor for class Servlet.RejectDutchAuctionServlet
 
rejectEnglishAuction(int) - Static method in class Handler.AuctionHandler
Updates the isActive flag on the server to declare the auction over and no longer visible to anyone
RejectEnglishAuctionServlet - Class in Servlet
RejectEnglishAuctionServlet handles the reject call and redirects back to AdminViewAuctionListServlet
RejectEnglishAuctionServlet() - Constructor for class Servlet.RejectEnglishAuctionServlet
